meanings.definition: A collection of literary works or passages.
meanings.sent1: The anthology on my bookshelf contains many short stories.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed reading the anthology of poems by different authors.
meanings.sent3: The anthology of fairy tales made her believe in magic again.
meanings.sent4: His life was like an anthology of adventures, each chapter more exciting than the last.
meanings.sent5: The anthology of recipes was a treasure trove of delicious dishes.

meanings.definition: A collection of selected writings by various authors.
meanings.sent1: The anthology of essays covered a wide range of topics.
meanings.sent2: Students were assigned to read an anthology of historical speeches.
meanings.sent3: The anthology of jokes had everyone laughing uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe was like an anthology of fashion trends over the years.
meanings.sent5: The anthology of photographs captured the essence of the city beautifully.
